He reflected severely on the Government for hint- ing at the use of force, and asked how it would have been regarded had the people of Nova Scotia been threatened, that every attempt at conciliation having been tried, other means would be used. Mr. Mackenzie moved, seconded by Hon. Mr. Holton, the adjournment of the debate.
